title: North Korea national football team
summary: The Democratic People's Republic of Korea national football team (Munhwaŏ Korean: 조선민주주의인민공화국 국가종합팀, recognized as Korea DPR by FIFA)[4] represents North Korea in men's international football and it is controlled by the DPR Korea Football Association, the governing body for Football in North Korea. The team represents both FIFA and Asian Football Confederation (AFC).
